GAMEPLAY_HikingPackADesc.English: A large bag designed for professional hikers. Can be worn in addition to your current backpack.
GAMEPLAY_HikingPackADesc.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa grande diseñada para excursionistas profesionales. Se puede usar además de su mochila actual.

GAMEPLAY_EmergencyAxeDesc.English: A reliable tool that can cut or open virtually anything.
GAMEPLAY_EmergencyAxeDesc.Spanish (Spain): Una herramienta confiable que puede cortar o abrir prácticamente cualquier cosa.
